00034 #ifndef btkNLMTool_H
00035 #define btkNLMTool_H

00051 template <typename T>
00052 class btkNLMTool
00053 {
00054  public:
00055   typedef typename itk::Image< T, 3> itkTImage;
00056   typedef typename itkTImage::Pointer itkTPointer;
00057   typedef typename itk::ImageDuplicator< itkTImage > itkTDuplicator;
00058   typedef typename itk::ImageRegionIterator< itkTImage > itkTIterator;
00059   typedef typename itk::ImageRegionConstIterator< itkTImage > itkTConstIterator;
00060   typedef typename itk::ImageRegionIteratorWithIndex< itkTImage > itkTIteratorWithIndex;
00061 
00062   typedef typename itk::Image< float, 3> itkFloatImage;
00063   typedef typename itkFloatImage::Pointer itkFloatPointer;
00064   typedef typename itk::ImageRegionIterator< itkFloatImage > itkFloatIterator;
00065   typedef typename itk::ImageRegionIteratorWithIndex< itkFloatImage > itkFloatIteratorWithIndex;
00066 
00067 
00068   itkTPointer m_inputImage;
00069   itkTPointer m_outputImage;
00070   itkTPointer m_maskImage;
00071   itkFloatPointer m_meanImage;
00072   itkFloatPointer m_varianceImage;
00073   
00074   //Image information (size, spacing etc.)
00075   typename itkTImage::SpacingType m_spacing;
00076   typename itkTImage::SizeType    m_size;
00077   typename itkTImage::RegionType  m_region;
00078   
00079   typename itkTImage::SizeType m_halfPatchSize;          //half of the patch size
00080   typename itkTImage::SizeType m_fullPatchSize;          //patch size  : 2 * halfPatchSize + 1
00081   typename itkTImage::SizeType m_halfSpatialBandwidth;   //equivalent to the half size of the volume search area in non-local means
00082   typename itkTImage::SizeType m_fullSpatialBandwidth;   //spatial bandwidth : 2 * halfSpatialBandwidth + 1
00083 
00084   float m_padding;
00085   float m_rangeBandwidth;
00086   int   m_centralPointStrategy;
00087   int   m_blockwise;
00088   int   m_optimized;
00089   float m_lowerMeanThreshold;
00090   float m_lowerVarianceThreshold;
00091 
00092   void SetInput(itkTPointer inputImage);
00093   void SetPatchSize(int h);
00094   void SetSpatialBandwidth(int s);
00095   void SetPaddingValue(float padding);
00096   void SetMaskImage(itkTPointer maskImage);
00097   void SetCentralPointStrategy(int s);
00098   void SetBlockwiseStrategy(int b);
00099   void SetOptimizationStrategy(int o);
00100   void SetLowerThresholds(float m, float v);
00101   void SetSmoothing(float beta);                       //set the smoothing parameter and compute the corrected smoothing value (m_rangeBandwidth)
00102   void GetOutput(itkTPointer & outputImage);
00103   void ComputeOutput();
00104   void PrintInfo();
00105   
00106   void CreatePatch(itkTPointer & patch);
00107   void CreatePatch(itkFloatPointer & patch);
00108   void GetPatch(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, itkTPointer & patch);
00109   void AddPatchToImage(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, itkFloatPointer & patch, itkFloatPointer & image, itkFloatPointer & weightImage, double weight);
00110   double PatchDistance(itkTPointer & p,itkTPointer & q);
00111 
00112   double GetDenoisedPatch(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, itkFloatPointer & patch);
00113   void ComputeSearchRegion(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, typename itkTImage::RegionType & region);
00114   void ComputePatchRegion(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, typename itkTImage::RegionType & imageRegion, typename itkTImage::RegionType & patchRegion);
00115   bool CheckSpeed(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, typename itkTImage::IndexType q);
00116 };
00117 
00118 template <typename T>
00119 void btkNLMTool<T>::SetInput(itkTPointer inputImage)
00120 {
00121   m_inputImage = inputImage; 
00122   //compute characteristics of the input image
00123   m_region  = m_inputImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00124   m_size    = m_region.GetSize();
00125   m_spacing = m_inputImage->GetSpacing();
00126   
00127   //duplicate the input image into the output image to keep all header information
00128   typename itkTDuplicator::Pointer duplicator = itkTDuplicator::New();
00129   duplicator->SetInputImage( inputImage );
00130   duplicator->Update();
00131   m_outputImage = duplicator->GetOutput();
00132 }
00133 
00134 template <typename T>
00135 void btkNLMTool<T>::SetPatchSize(int h)
00136 {
00137   std::cout<<"Computing patch size (taking into account possible image anisotropy)\n";    
00138   float minVoxSz = m_spacing[0];
00139   if(m_spacing[1] < minVoxSz) minVoxSz = m_spacing[1];
00140   if(m_spacing[2] < minVoxSz) minVoxSz = m_spacing[2];
00141 
00142   m_halfPatchSize[0] = (int)(0.5 + h * minVoxSz / m_spacing[0]);
00143   m_halfPatchSize[1] = (int)(0.5 + h * minVoxSz / m_spacing[1]);
00144   m_halfPatchSize[2] = (int)(0.5 + h * minVoxSz / m_spacing[2]);
00145   std::cout<<"patchSize : "<<m_halfPatchSize[0]<<" "<<m_halfPatchSize[1]<<" "<<m_halfPatchSize[2]<<"\n";
00146   
00147   m_fullPatchSize[0] = 2 * m_halfPatchSize[0] + 1;
00148   m_fullPatchSize[1] = 2 * m_halfPatchSize[1] + 1;
00149   m_fullPatchSize[2] = 2 * m_halfPatchSize[2] + 1;
00150 }
00151 
00152 template <typename T>
00153 void btkNLMTool<T>::SetSpatialBandwidth(int s)
00154 {
00155   std::cout<<"Computing spatial bandwidth (taking into account possible image anisotropy)\n";    
00156   float minVoxSz = m_spacing[0];
00157   if(m_spacing[1] < minVoxSz) minVoxSz = m_spacing[1];
00158   if(m_spacing[2] < minVoxSz) minVoxSz = m_spacing[2];
00159 
00160   m_halfSpatialBandwidth[0] = (int)(0.5 + s * minVoxSz / m_spacing[0]);
00161   m_halfSpatialBandwidth[1] = (int)(0.5 + s * minVoxSz / m_spacing[1]);
00162   m_halfSpatialBandwidth[2] = (int)(0.5 + s * minVoxSz / m_spacing[2]);
00163   std::cout<<"spatialBandwidth : "<<m_halfSpatialBandwidth[0]<<" "<<m_halfSpatialBandwidth[1]<<" "<<m_halfSpatialBandwidth[2]<<"\n";  
00164   
00165   m_fullSpatialBandwidth[0] = 2 * m_halfSpatialBandwidth[0] + 1;
00166   m_fullSpatialBandwidth[1] = 2 * m_halfSpatialBandwidth[1] + 1;
00167   m_fullSpatialBandwidth[2] = 2 * m_halfSpatialBandwidth[2] + 1;
00168 }
00169 
00170 template <typename T>
00171 void btkNLMTool<T>::SetPaddingValue(float padding)
00172 {
00173   m_padding = padding;
00174   
00175   std::cout<<"Creating the mask image using the padding value ("<<padding<<")\n";
00176   typename itkTDuplicator::Pointer duplicator = itkTDuplicator::New();
00177   duplicator->SetInputImage( m_inputImage );
00178   duplicator->Update();
00179   m_maskImage = duplicator->GetOutput();
00180 
00181   double count = 0;
00182   itkTIterator iterator( m_maskImage, m_maskImage->GetRequestedRegion() );
00183   for(iterator.GoToBegin(); !iterator.IsAtEnd(); ++iterator){
00184     if(iterator.Get() <= padding)
00185       iterator.Set(0);
00186     else{
00187       iterator.Set(1);
00188       count++;
00189     }
00190   }
00191   std::cout<<"Percentage of points to be processed : "<<(int)(count / m_maskImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetNumberOfPixels() * 100.0) <<"\n";
00192   
00193 }
00194 
00195 template <typename T>
00196 void btkNLMTool<T>::SetMaskImage(itkTPointer maskImage)
00197 {
00198   m_maskImage = maskImage; 
00199   
00200   //check the size and spacing of the mask wrt the input image
00201   typename itkTImage::SpacingType spacing;
00202   typename itkTImage::SizeType    size;
00203   typename itkTImage::RegionType  region;
00204   
00205   region  = m_maskImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00206   size    = m_region.GetSize();
00207   spacing = m_maskImage->GetSpacing(); 
00208   
00209   typename itkTImage::IndexType q;
00210   for(unsigned int i=0; i!= q.GetIndexDimension(); i++)
00211     if( (size[i] != m_size[i]) || (spacing[i] != m_spacing[i]) ){
00212       std::cout<<"*************************************************************************************\n";
00213       std::cout<<"WARNING : the size or the spacing of the mask image are incorrect wrt the input image\n";
00214       std::cout<<"*************************************************************************************\n";      
00215       break;
00216     }
00217   
00218   double count = 0;
00219   itkTIterator iterator( m_maskImage, m_maskImage->GetRequestedRegion() );
00220   for(iterator.GoToBegin(); !iterator.IsAtEnd(); ++iterator){
00221     if(iterator.Get() > 0)
00222       count++;
00223   }
00224   std::cout<<"Percentage of points to be processed : "<<(int)(count / m_maskImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetNumberOfPixels() * 100.0) <<"\n";
00225   
00226   
00227 }
00228

00230 void btkNLMTool<T>::SetCentralPointStrategy(int s)
00231 {
00232   m_centralPointStrategy = s;
00233 }

00235 template <typename T>
00236 void btkNLMTool<T>::SetBlockwiseStrategy(int b)

00238   m_blockwise = b;
00239 }

00241 template <typename T>
00242 void btkNLMTool<T>::SetOptimizationStrategy(int o)
00243 {
00244   m_optimized = o;
00245 
00246   if(o==1){
00247     std::cout<<"Optimized mode. Computing Mean and Variance images\n";
00248     m_meanImage = itkFloatImage::New();
00249     m_meanImage->SetRegions(m_inputImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00250     m_meanImage->SetSpacing( m_inputImage->GetSpacing() );
00251     m_meanImage->SetOrigin( m_inputImage->GetOrigin() );
00252     m_meanImage->SetDirection( m_inputImage->GetDirection() );
00253     m_meanImage->Allocate();
00254     m_meanImage->FillBuffer(0); 
00255 
00256     m_varianceImage = itkFloatImage::New();
00257     m_varianceImage->SetRegions(m_inputImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00258     m_varianceImage->SetSpacing( m_inputImage->GetSpacing() );
00259     m_varianceImage->SetOrigin( m_inputImage->GetOrigin() );
00260     m_varianceImage->SetDirection( m_inputImage->GetDirection() );
00261     m_varianceImage->Allocate();
00262     m_varianceImage->FillBuffer(0); 
00263 
00264     int x,y,z;
00265     #pragma omp parallel for private(x,y,z) schedule(dynamic)
00266     for(z=0; z < (int)m_size[2]; z++)
00267       for(y=0; y < (int)m_size[1]; y++)
00268         for(x=0; x < (int)m_size[0]; x++){
00269           typename itkTImage::IndexType p;
00270           p[0] = x;
00271           p[1] = y;
00272           p[2] = z;
00273 
00274           if( m_maskImage->GetPixel(p) > 0 ){     
00275             itkTPointer patch = itkTImage::New();
00276             CreatePatch(patch);
00277             GetPatch(p,patch);
00278             itkTIterator itp( patch, patch->GetRequestedRegion() );
00279             double m = 0;
00280             double m2= 0;
00281             for(itp.GoToBegin(); !itp.IsAtEnd(); ++itp){
00282               m += itp.Get();
00283               m2+= (itp.Get() * itp.Get());     
00284             }
00285             int n = patch->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetNumberOfPixels();
00286             float mean = m / n;
00287             float variance = (m2 / n) - (mean * mean) ;
00288             
00289             m_meanImage->SetPixel( p, mean );             
00290             m_varianceImage->SetPixel( p, variance );             
00291           }
00292       }
00293 
00294   }
00295 }
00296 
00297 template <typename T>
00298 void btkNLMTool<T>::SetLowerThresholds(float m, float v)
00299 {
00300   m_lowerMeanThreshold = m;
00301   m_lowerVarianceThreshold = v;
00302 }

00304 
00305 template <typename T>
00306 void btkNLMTool<T>::SetSmoothing(float beta)
00307 {
00308   //this function should be rewritten using a convolution-based approach
00309   std::cout<<"Computing the range bandwidth (corresponding to the smoothing parameter for the NLM algorithm).\n";
00310   uint count = 0;
00311   double sigma2 = 0;
00312   int x,y,z;
00313   typename itkTImage::IndexType pixelIndex;     
00314   float ei = 0;
00315   std::vector<float> vecei;
00316   T value = 0;
00317   //since we have use to use a neighborhood around the current voxel, we neglect the border to avoid slow tests.
00318   for(z=1;z<(int)m_size[2]-1;z++)
00319     for(y=1;y<(int)m_size[1]-1;y++)
00320       for(x=1;x<(int)m_size[0]-1;x++){
00321         pixelIndex[0] = x;
00322         pixelIndex[1] = y;
00323         pixelIndex[2] = z;
00324         value = m_inputImage->GetPixel(pixelIndex);
00325         if( m_maskImage->GetPixel(pixelIndex) > 0){
00326           //pourrait se faire avec une convolution !
00327           pixelIndex[0] = x+1;    pixelIndex[1] = y;      pixelIndex[2] = z;
00328           ei = m_inputImage->GetPixel(pixelIndex);
00329           pixelIndex[0] = x-1;    pixelIndex[1] = y;      pixelIndex[2] = z;
00330           ei += m_inputImage->GetPixel(pixelIndex);
00331           pixelIndex[0] = x;              pixelIndex[1] = y+1;    pixelIndex[2] = z;
00332           ei += m_inputImage->GetPixel(pixelIndex);
00333           pixelIndex[0] = x;      pixelIndex[1] = y-1;    pixelIndex[2] = z;
00334           ei += m_inputImage->GetPixel(pixelIndex);
00335           pixelIndex[0] = x;      pixelIndex[1] = y;      pixelIndex[2] = z+1;
00336           ei += m_inputImage->GetPixel(pixelIndex);
00337           pixelIndex[0] = x;      pixelIndex[1] = y;      pixelIndex[2] = z-1;
00338           ei += m_inputImage->GetPixel(pixelIndex);
00339           pixelIndex[0] = x;            pixelIndex[1] = y;        pixelIndex[2] = z;
00340           ei = sqrt(6.0/7.0)*(m_inputImage->GetPixel(pixelIndex) -ei/6.0);
00341             
00342           sigma2 += ei*ei;
00343           count ++;
00344           if(fabs(ei>0))
00345             vecei.push_back(fabs(ei));
00346         }
00347       }
00348   //Estimation of sigma with MAD
00349   std::sort(vecei.begin(), vecei.end());
00350   float med = vecei[(int)(vecei.size()/2)];
00351   for(uint i=0; i<vecei.size(); i++)
00352     vecei[i] = fabs(vecei[i] - med);
00353   std::sort(vecei.begin(), vecei.end());
00354     
00355   sigma2 = 1.4826 * vecei[(int)(vecei.size()/2)];
00356   sigma2 = sigma2 * sigma2;
00357   std::cout<<"Number of points for estimation : "<<count<<"\n";
00358   std::cout<<"Estimated Global Sigma : "<<sqrt(sigma2)<<"\n";
00359   float NLMsmooth = 2 * beta * sigma2 * (2*m_halfPatchSize[0]+1) * (2*m_halfPatchSize[1]+1) * (2*m_halfPatchSize[2]+1);
00360   std::cout<<"Global smoothing parameter h : "<<sqrt(NLMsmooth)<<"\n";
00361   m_rangeBandwidth = NLMsmooth;   
00362 }
00363 
00364 template <typename T>
00365 void btkNLMTool<T>::GetOutput(itkTPointer & outputImage)
00366 {
00367   outputImage = m_outputImage; 
00368 }
00369 
00370 template <typename T>
00371 void btkNLMTool<T>::ComputeOutput()
00372 {
00373   std::cout<<"Compute the denoised image using NLM algorithm\n";
00374   
00375   itkFloatPointer denoisedImage = itkFloatImage::New();
00376   denoisedImage->SetRegions(m_inputImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00377   denoisedImage->SetSpacing( m_inputImage->GetSpacing() );
00378   denoisedImage->SetOrigin( m_inputImage->GetOrigin() );
00379   denoisedImage->SetDirection( m_inputImage->GetDirection() );
00380   denoisedImage->Allocate();
00381   denoisedImage->FillBuffer(0); 
00382 
00383   
00384   itkFloatIterator denoisedIt( denoisedImage, denoisedImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion() );
00385   itkTIterator outputIt( m_outputImage, m_outputImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00386 
00387   int x,y,z;
00388           
00389   if(m_blockwise == 0){
00390     std::cout<<"pointwise denoising\n";
00391     typename itkTImage::IndexType q;
00392     for(unsigned int i=0; i!= q.GetIndexDimension(); i++)
00393       q[i] = m_halfPatchSize[i];
00394     #pragma omp parallel for private(x,y,z) schedule(dynamic)
00395     for(z=0; z < (int)m_size[2]; z++)
00396       for(y=0; y < (int)m_size[1]; y++)
00397         for(x=0; x < (int)m_size[0]; x++){
00398           typename itkTImage::IndexType p;
00399           p[0] = x;
00400           p[1] = y;
00401           p[2] = z;
00402 
00403           if( m_maskImage->GetPixel(p) > 0 ){     
00404             itkFloatPointer patch = itkFloatImage::New();
00405             double sum = GetDenoisedPatch(p, patch);
00406             denoisedImage->SetPixel( p, patch->GetPixel(q) );             
00407           }
00408       }
00409   }
00410   if(m_blockwise >= 1){
00411     itkFloatPointer weightImage = itkFloatImage::New();
00412     weightImage->SetRegions(m_inputImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00413     weightImage->SetSpacing( m_inputImage->GetSpacing() );
00414     weightImage->SetOrigin( m_inputImage->GetOrigin() );
00415     weightImage->SetDirection( m_inputImage->GetDirection() );
00416     weightImage->Allocate();
00417     weightImage->FillBuffer(0); 
00418 
00419     if(m_blockwise == 1){
00420       std::cout<<"blockwise denoising\n";
00421       #pragma omp parallel for private(x,y,z) schedule(dynamic)
00422       for(z=0; z < (int)m_size[2]; z++)
00423         for(y=0; y < (int)m_size[1]; y++)
00424           for(x=0; x < (int)m_size[0]; x++){
00425             typename itkTImage::IndexType p;
00426             p[0] = x;
00427             p[1] = y;
00428             p[2] = z;
00429 
00430             if( m_maskImage->GetPixel(p) > 0 ){   
00431               itkFloatPointer patch = itkFloatImage::New();
00432               double sum = GetDenoisedPatch(p, patch);             
00433               double weight = 1.0;
00434               #pragma omp critical
00435               AddPatchToImage(p, patch, denoisedImage, weightImage, weight);
00436             }
00437           }
00438     }
00439     if(m_blockwise == 2){
00440       std::cout<<"fast blockwise denoising\n";
00441       #pragma omp parallel for private(x,y,z) schedule(dynamic)
00442       for(z=0; z < (int)m_size[2]; z++)
00443         if( z%(m_halfPatchSize[2]+1) == 0){
00444         for(y=0; y < (int)m_size[1]; y++)
00445           if( y%(m_halfPatchSize[1]+1) == 0){
00446           for(x=0; x < (int)m_size[0]; x++)
00447             if( x%(m_halfPatchSize[0]+1) == 0 ){
00448               typename itkTImage::IndexType p;
00449               p[0] = x;
00450               p[1] = y;
00451               p[2] = z;
00452 
00453               if( m_maskImage->GetPixel(p) > 0 ){         
00454                 itkFloatPointer patch = itkFloatImage::New();
00455                 double sum = GetDenoisedPatch(p, patch);
00456                 double weight = 1.0;
00457                 #pragma omp critical
00458                 AddPatchToImage(p, patch, denoisedImage, weightImage, weight);
00459               }
00460             }
00461           }
00462         }
00463     }
00464 
00465     itkFloatIterator weightIt( weightImage, weightImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion() );
00466     //weight normalization
00467     for ( denoisedIt.GoToBegin(), weightIt.GoToBegin(); !denoisedIt.IsAtEnd(); ++denoisedIt, ++weightIt)
00468       if( weightIt.Get() > 0 )
00469         denoisedIt.Set( denoisedIt.Get() / weightIt.Get() );
00470 
00471   }
00472 
00473   //Convert float data from denoisedImage to T data for m_outputImage
00474   for ( denoisedIt.GoToBegin(), outputIt.GoToBegin(); !denoisedIt.IsAtEnd(); ++denoisedIt, ++outputIt)
00475     //outputIt.Set( (T)rint(denoisedIt.Get()) );
00476     outputIt.Set( (T)(denoisedIt.Get()) );
00477 
00478   //This can be done also using an ITK filter, but in this case, the output data are truncated (not rounded)
00479   /*
00480   typename itk::CastImageFilter< itkFloatImage, itkTImage >::Pointer castFilter = itk::CastImageFilter< itkFloatImage, itkTImage >::New();
00481   castFilter->SetInput(denoisedImage);
00482   castFilter->Update();
00483   m_outputImage = castFilter->GetOutput();
00484   */
00485   
00486 }
00487 
00488 template <typename T>
00489 void btkNLMTool<T>::PrintInfo()
00490 {
00491   //Image information (size, spacing etc.)
00492   std::cout<<"size of the input image: "<<m_size[0]<<" "<<m_size[1]<<" "<<m_size[2]<<"\n";
00493   std::cout<<"spacing of the input image: "<<m_spacing[0]<<" "<<m_spacing[1]<<" "<<m_spacing[2]<<"\n";
00494   
00495   //Image information (size, spacing etc.)
00496   typename itkTImage::SpacingType spacing;
00497   typename itkTImage::SizeType    size;
00498   typename itkTImage::RegionType  region;
00499   
00500   region  = m_outputImage->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00501   size    = region.GetSize();
00502   std::cout<<"size of the output image: "<<size[0]<<" "<<size[1]<<" "<<size[2]<<"\n";
00503   spacing = m_outputImage->GetSpacing();
00504   std::cout<<"spacing of the output image: "<<spacing[0]<<" "<<spacing[1]<<" "<<spacing[2]<<"\n";
00505   
00506 }
00507 
00508 template <typename T>
00509 void btkNLMTool<T>::CreatePatch(itkTPointer & patch)
00510 {
00511   //resize and allocate the patch and set the estimate to 0
00512   typename itkTImage::SizeType size = m_fullPatchSize;
00513   typename itkTImage::RegionType region;
00514   region.SetSize(size);
00515   patch->SetRegions(region);
00516   patch->Allocate();
00517   patch->FillBuffer(0);  
00518 }

00521 template <typename T>
00522 void btkNLMTool<T>::CreatePatch(itkFloatPointer & patch)
00523 {
00524   //resize and allocate the patch and set the estimate to 0
00525   typename itkFloatImage::SizeType size = m_fullPatchSize;
00526   typename itkFloatImage::RegionType region;
00527   region.SetSize(size);
00528   patch->SetRegions(region);
00529   patch->Allocate();
00530   patch->FillBuffer(0.0);  
00531 }

00533 template <typename T>
00534 void btkNLMTool<T>::GetPatch(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, itkTPointer & patch)
00535 {
00536   //this function is equivalent to a cropping function
00537   //WARNING : no check about the size of the input patch !
00538   patch->FillBuffer(0);
00539   typename itkTImage::RegionType imageRegion;
00540   typename itkTImage::RegionType patchRegion;
00541   ComputePatchRegion(p,imageRegion,patchRegion);
00542   
00543   itkTConstIterator inputIt( m_inputImage, imageRegion);
00544   itkTIterator outputIt( patch, patchRegion);
00545 
00546   for ( inputIt.GoToBegin(), outputIt.GoToBegin(); !inputIt.IsAtEnd(); ++inputIt, ++outputIt)
00547     outputIt.Set( inputIt.Get() );
00548 
00549   
00550   //Old school style :)
00551   /*
00552   typename itkTImage::IndexType pixelIndex;     
00553   typename itkTImage::IndexType patchIndex;
00554 
00555   for(int pz=-(int)m_halfPatchSize[2];pz<=(int)m_halfPatchSize[2];pz++){
00556     pixelIndex[2] = p[2] + pz;
00557     patchIndex[2] = pz + m_halfPatchSize[2];
00558     if( (pixelIndex[2]>=0) && (pixelIndex[2]<(int)m_size[2]) ){
00559       for(int py=-(int)m_halfPatchSize[1];py<=(int)m_halfPatchSize[1];py++){
00560         pixelIndex[1] = p[1] + py;
00561         patchIndex[1] = py + m_halfPatchSize[1];
00562         if( (pixelIndex[1]>=0) && (pixelIndex[1]<(int)m_size[1]) ){
00563           for(int px=-(int)m_halfPatchSize[0];px<=(int)m_halfPatchSize[0];px++){
00564             pixelIndex[0] = p[0] + px;
00565             patchIndex[0] = px + m_halfPatchSize[0];
00566             if( (pixelIndex[0]>=0) && (pixelIndex[0]<(int)m_size[0]) ){
00567               patch->SetPixel(patchIndex, m_inputImage->GetPixel(pixelIndex));
00568             }
00569           }
00570         }
00571       }
00572     }
00573   }
00574   */
00575   
00576 }
00577 
00578 template <typename T>
00579 void btkNLMTool<T>::AddPatchToImage(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, itkFloatPointer & patch, itkFloatPointer & image, itkFloatPointer & weightImage, double weight)
00580 {
00581   //this function add a patch value to the denoised image
00582   typename itkTImage::RegionType imageRegion;
00583   typename itkTImage::RegionType patchRegion;
00584   ComputePatchRegion(p,imageRegion,patchRegion);
00585   
00586   itkFloatIterator imageIt( image, imageRegion);
00587   itkFloatIterator weightIt( weightImage, imageRegion);
00588   itkFloatIterator patchIt( patch, patchRegion);
00589 
00590   for ( imageIt.GoToBegin(), patchIt.GoToBegin(), weightIt.GoToBegin(); !imageIt.IsAtEnd(); ++imageIt, ++patchIt, ++weightIt){
00591     imageIt.Set( imageIt.Get() + patchIt.Get() );
00592     weightIt.Set( weightIt.Get() + weight );
00593   }
00594   
00595 }
00596 
00597 template <typename T>
00598 double btkNLMTool<T>::PatchDistance(itkTPointer & p,itkTPointer & q)
00599 {
00600   double diff=0;
00601   double dist = 0;
00602   itkTConstIterator itp( p, p->GetRequestedRegion() );
00603   itkTConstIterator itq( q, q->GetRequestedRegion() );
00604 
00605   for(itp.GoToBegin(), itq.GoToBegin(); !itp.IsAtEnd(); ++itp, ++itq){
00606     diff = itp.Get() - itq.Get();
00607     dist += diff*diff;  
00608   }
00609   return dist;
00610 }
00611 
00612 template <typename T>
00613 double btkNLMTool<T>::GetDenoisedPatch(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, itkFloatPointer & patch)
00614 {
00615   double wmax = 0; //maximum weight of patches
00616   double sum  = 0; //sum of weights (used for normalization purpose)
00617   
00618   //create the patch and set the estimate to 0
00619   CreatePatch(patch);
00620   itkFloatIterator patchIt(patch, patch->GetRequestedRegion());
00621 
00622   //get the value of the patch around the current pixel
00623   itkTPointer centralPatch = itkTImage::New();
00624   CreatePatch(centralPatch);
00625   GetPatch(p,centralPatch);
00626   itkTIterator centralPatchIt(centralPatch, centralPatch->GetRequestedRegion());
00627 
00628   //set the search region around the current pixel
00629   typename itkTImage::RegionType searchRegion;
00630   ComputeSearchRegion(p,searchRegion);
00631   
00632   //create the patch for pixels in the neighbourhood of the current pixel
00633   itkTPointer neighbourPatch = itkTImage::New();
00634   CreatePatch(neighbourPatch);
00635   itkTIterator neighbourPatchIt(neighbourPatch, neighbourPatch->GetRequestedRegion());
00636   
00637   //go through the neighbourhood with a region iterator
00638   itkTIteratorWithIndex it( m_inputImage, searchRegion);
00639   typename itkTImage::IndexType neighbourPixelIndex;    
00640 
00641   for(it.GoToBegin(); !it.IsAtEnd(); ++it){
00642     neighbourPixelIndex = it.GetIndex();
00643 
00644     bool goForIt = true;
00645     if(m_optimized == 1)
00646       goForIt = CheckSpeed(p, neighbourPixelIndex);
00647 
00648     if(goForIt == true){
00649     
00650       GetPatch(neighbourPixelIndex, neighbourPatch);  
00651       double weight = exp( - PatchDistance(centralPatch, neighbourPatch) / m_rangeBandwidth);
00652 
00653       if(weight>wmax)
00654         if( (p[0] != neighbourPixelIndex[0]) && (p[1] != neighbourPixelIndex[1]) && (p[2] != neighbourPixelIndex[2]) ) //has to be modify
00655           wmax = weight;
00656       
00657       sum += weight;
00658     
00659       //Add this patch to the current estimate using the computed weight
00660       for(patchIt.GoToBegin(), neighbourPatchIt.GoToBegin(); !patchIt.IsAtEnd(); ++patchIt, ++neighbourPatchIt){
00661         patchIt.Set( patchIt.Get() + neighbourPatchIt.Get() * weight );
00662       }
00663     }
00664   }
00665 
00666   
00667   //consider now the special case of the central patch
00668   switch(m_centralPointStrategy){
00669     case 0:                                        //remove the central patch to the estimated patch
00670       for(patchIt.GoToBegin(), centralPatchIt.GoToBegin(); !patchIt.IsAtEnd(); ++patchIt, ++centralPatchIt)
00671         patchIt.Set( patchIt.Get() -1.0 * centralPatchIt.Get() );
00672       sum -= 1.0;
00673       break;
00674     case 1: break;                                 //nothing to do
00675     case -1:
00676       for(patchIt.GoToBegin(), centralPatchIt.GoToBegin(); !patchIt.IsAtEnd(); ++patchIt, ++centralPatchIt)
00677         patchIt.Set( patchIt.Get()  + (wmax -1.0) * centralPatchIt.Get() );
00678       sum += (wmax - 1.0);
00679       break;
00680     default:                                       //as in case -1
00681       for(patchIt.GoToBegin(), centralPatchIt.GoToBegin(); !patchIt.IsAtEnd(); ++patchIt, ++centralPatchIt)
00682         patchIt.Set( patchIt.Get()  + (wmax -1.0) * centralPatchIt.Get() );
00683       sum += (wmax - 1.0);
00684       break;
00685   }  
00686     
00687   if(sum>0.0001)
00688     //Normalization of the denoised patch 
00689     for(patchIt.GoToBegin(); !patchIt.IsAtEnd(); ++patchIt)
00690       patchIt.Set( patchIt.Get() / sum );
00691   else
00692     //copy the central patch to the denoised patch
00693     for(patchIt.GoToBegin(), centralPatchIt.GoToBegin(); !patchIt.IsAtEnd(); ++patchIt, ++centralPatchIt)
00694       patchIt.Set( centralPatchIt.Get() );  
00695     
00696   return sum;
00697 }
00698 
00699 template <typename T>
00700 bool btkNLMTool<T>::CheckSpeed(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, typename itkTImage::IndexType q)
00701 {
00702   bool goForIt = true;
00703 
00704   float mSpeed = 0;
00705   if(m_meanImage->GetPixel(q) ==0){
00706     if(m_meanImage->GetPixel(p) == 0)
00707       mSpeed = 1;
00708     else
00709       mSpeed = 0;
00710   }
00711   else
00712     mSpeed = m_meanImage->GetPixel(p) / m_meanImage->GetPixel(q);
00713 
00714   if( (mSpeed < m_lowerMeanThreshold) || (mSpeed > 1/m_lowerMeanThreshold) )
00715     goForIt = false;
00716 
00717   float vSpeed = 0;
00718   if(m_varianceImage->GetPixel(q) ==0){
00719     if(m_varianceImage->GetPixel(p) == 0)
00720       vSpeed = 1;
00721     else
00722       vSpeed = 0;
00723   }
00724   else
00725     vSpeed = m_varianceImage->GetPixel(p) / m_varianceImage->GetPixel(q);
00726 
00727   if( (vSpeed < m_lowerVarianceThreshold) || (vSpeed > 1/m_lowerVarianceThreshold) )
00728     goForIt = false;
00729 
00730   return goForIt;
00731 }
00732 
00733 template <typename T>
00734 void btkNLMTool<T>::ComputeSearchRegion(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, typename itkTImage::RegionType & region)
00735 {
00736   //create an appropiate search region around the current pixel p
00737   typename itkTImage::RegionType::IndexType start;
00738   typename itkTImage::RegionType::SizeType size;
00739   
00740   for(unsigned int i=0; i!= p.GetIndexDimension(); i++){
00741     start[i] = p[i] - m_halfSpatialBandwidth[i];
00742     size[i] = m_fullSpatialBandwidth[i];
00743         
00744     if(start[i] < 0){                  //if the starting index is outside the image (<0)
00745       size[i] += start[i];
00746       start[i] = 0;
00747     }
00748     else if(start[i] >= (int)m_size[i]){    //if the starting index is outside the image (>image size)
00749       start[i] = m_size[i]-1;
00750       size[i] = 0;
00751     }
00752     
00753     int d = (start[i] + size[i]) - m_size[i]; //if the region is not fully inside the image
00754     if(d>0){
00755       size[i] = size[i] - d;
00756       if(size[i] < 0) size[i] = 0;
00757     }    
00758   }
00759   region.SetSize( size );
00760   region.SetIndex( start );
00761 }
00762 
00763 template <typename T>
00764 void btkNLMTool<T>::ComputePatchRegion(typename itkTImage::IndexType p, typename itkTImage::RegionType & imageRegion, typename itkTImage::RegionType & patchRegion)
00765 {
00766   //create an appropriate patch region around the current pixel p, and consider an offset for pixels close to boundaries.
00767   //the patch region is defined in the image coordinate system.
00768   //the offset allows to do the link between the patch coordinate system and the one of the image.
00769   typename itkTImage::RegionType::IndexType start;
00770   typename itkTImage::RegionType::IndexType offset;
00771   typename itkTImage::RegionType::SizeType size;
00772 
00773   for(unsigned int i=0; i!= p.GetIndexDimension(); i++){
00774     start[i] = p[i] - m_halfPatchSize[i];
00775     size[i] = m_fullPatchSize[i];
00776     offset[i] = 0;
00777     
00778     if(start[i] < 0){                  //if the starting index is outside the image (<0)
00779       size[i] += start[i];
00780       offset[i] = -start[i];
00781       start[i] = 0;
00782     }
00783     else if(start[i] >= (int)m_size[i]){    //if the starting index is outside the image (>image size)
00784       start[i] = m_size[i]-1;
00785       size[i] = 0;
00786     }
00787     
00788     int d = (start[i] + size[i]) - m_size[i]; //if the region is not fully inside the image
00789     if(d>0){
00790       size[i] = size[i] - d;
00791       if(size[i] < 0) size[i] = 0;
00792     }    
00793   }  
00794   imageRegion.SetSize( size );
00795   imageRegion.SetIndex( start );    
00796   patchRegion.SetSize( size );
00797   patchRegion.SetIndex( offset );    
00798 }
